validationReport.statement: PDF file is not compliant with Validation Profile requirements.

rule.description: The PDF/UA version and conformance level of a file shall be specified using the PDF/UA Identification extension schema

check.errorMessage: The document metadata stream doesn't contain PDF/UA Identification Schema

rule.description: Links shall contain an alternate description via their Contents key as described in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.9.3

check.errorMessage: A link annotation does not include an alternate description in the Contents key
A link annotation does not include an alternate description in the Contents key

rule.description: Links shall be tagged according to ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.8.4.4.2, Link Element

check.errorMessage: A Link annotation is an Artifact or is nested within null tag (standard type = null) instead of Link

rule.description: All non-standard structure types shall be mapped to the nearest functionally equivalent standard type, as defined in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.8.4, in the role map dictionary of the structure tree root. This mapping may be indirect; within the role map a non-standard type can map directly to another non-standard type, but eventually the mapping shall terminate at a standard type

check.context: root/document[0]/StructTreeRoot[0](41 0 obj PDStructTreeRoot)/K[0](44 0 obj SEPart Part)/K[6](57 0 obj SESect Sect)/K[3](61 0 obj SENonStandard Artifact)
check.errorMessage: Non-standard structure type Artifact is not mapped to a standard type

rule.description: If the FontDescriptor dictionary of an embedded CID font contains a CIDSet stream, then it shall identify all CIDs which are present in the font program, regardless of whether a CID in the font is referenced or used by the PDF or not
rule.test: containsFontFile == false || fontName.search(/[A-Z]{6}\+/) != 0 || containsCIDSet == false || cidSetListsAllGlyphs == true

check.errorMessage: A CIDSet entry in the Font descriptor does not correctly identify all glyphs present in the embedded font subset

rule.description: The font programs for all fonts used for rendering within a conforming file shall be embedded within that file, as defined in ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.9

check.errorMessage: The font program is not embedded

rule.description: An annotation (except Widget annotations or hidden annotations, or those having rectangle outside the crop-box) shall have either Contents key or an Alt entry in the enclosing structure element
rule.test: Subtype == 'Widget' || isOutsideCropBox == true || (F & 2) == 2 || (Contents != null && Contents != '') || (Alt != null && Alt != '')

check.errorMessage: Link annotation whose hidden flag is not set and whose rectangle is not outside the crop-box has neither Contents key nor an Alt entry in the enclosing structure element
Link annotation whose hidden flag is not set and whose rectangle is not outside the crop-box has neither Contents key nor an Alt entry in the enclosing structure element
